name: Sky Torus
description:
Sky Torus is a shmup made for Ludum Dare 47, where all bullets can loop around the screen, with possibility of friendly fire from yourself. It features 3 stages and 3 bosses

Controls: Arrow keys to move, Z to shoot, X to use a bomb
Protip: Being too trigger happy is a great way to shoot yourself accidentall

Random Tidbits:
- This game was built on a WIP engine I created for other personal projects
- Coroutines are really neat, and were heavily abused to make this game
- Powerups that increase the number of times your shot loops were planned but ultimately scrapped
- I've played maybe 1 or 2 shmup to completion, expect questionable level design
